column1: Local Foods////The sandwich was good. It was on sourdough bread
column5: and avocado. It also had some sort of sauce that really complimented the sandwich as well. The sandwich was very basic though
column6: it didn't have that wow factor that really said "I would totally get this sandwich again". For the sides
column7: pickles are pickles. The potato salad was hands down the best thing on this dish. It is so good and so unique. 10/10 would recommend the potato salad.
